snippet: The Scottish government is on the outs with Donald Trump, having proposed an offshore wind farm in view of his luxury golf resort.
abstract: The Scottish government is on the outs with Donald Trump, having proposed an offshore wind farm in view of his luxury golf resort.
lead_paragraph: Donald Trump denounces a government plan to build a wind farm off the coast of his luxury golf resort in Scotland. He accuses a minister of being "hellbent on destroying Scotland's coastline and therefore Scotland itself." [Associated Press]

headline.main: On Our Radar: Trump Assails Wind Farm
